# zen-toast



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                | Type     | Default                                      |
| -------------- | --------------- | -------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| `dismissLabel` | `dismiss-label` | Hide label                 | `string` | `'true'`                                     |
| `height`       | `height`        | Height                     | `string` | `'6rem'`                                     |
| `timeout`      | `timeout`       | Timeout to hide            | `string` | `'500'`                                      |
| `toastMessage` | `toast-message` | Message                    | `string` | `'You have successfully created new audit!'` |
| `toastTitle`   | `toast-title`   | Title                      | `string` | `'Success'`                                  |
| `variant`      | `variant`       | Color variant of the toast | `string` | `'success'`                                  |
| `width`        | `width`         | Width                      | `string` | `'35rem'`                                    |
